src_original: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇātipātānāṃ /  idam agram adattādānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyāpaharaṇatā /
idam agraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca /
idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyābhyākhyānaṃ /
idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utāryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ /
idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ /  idam agraṃ vyāpādānāṃ yad utānantaryaparikarṣaṇam /
idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā /  idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ /
ime kāśyapa daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā mahāsāvadyāḥ /  sacet kāśyapa ekasatva ebhir evaṃ mahāsāvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
